snippet.title: Remnant Planar Wars | Atari Lynx Collection 1 | Game 13 of 17 | Evercade Handheld
snippet.description:
As the last survivor in your sector of space, you have no job more important than defending your area from the invading alien hordes swarming your way. Aliens aren't the only thing threatening your life, however, as meteoroids and other space debris fly your way as well.

Your ship's hull will be partially restored after each wave of enemies. Watch out for slow moving enemy shots which you must dodge instead of shoot.

Year: 2000
Publisher: Songbird Productions
Genre: Space Shooter
